Dashboard.accountsSummaryDescription: Access your accounts here. Navigate to the 'Accounts' page to see a comprehensive list of all your accounts.
Dashboard.budgetsSummaryDescription: Explore your budgets here. Simply click on a budget card to view its details or create a new one from the 'Budgets' page.
Dashboard.goalSummaryDescription: Explore your goals here. Simply click on a goal card to view or edit its details, or create a new one by clicking the menu button above.
Dashboard.financialInsightsDescription: View a breakdown of your spending versus earnings for this month, along with additional financial insights.
Dashboard.notificationsAndRemindersDescription: Manage your notifications and reminders here.

Login.loginDescription: Sign in to access your account.
Login.captchaError: Captcha verification failed. Please try again.
Login.loginSuccessMessage: Logged in successfully. You are being redirected...
Login.signUpText: Don't have an account? Sign up
Login.twoFactorFormDescription: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication. Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to log in.

Register.registerFormDescription: Create an account to get started.
Register.registerFormEmailNote: Note: Please provide a valid email address for{' '} account verification, password recovery, and other important communications.

Settings.currencySettingsDescription: Choose your preferred currency for displaying amounts.
Settings.notificationSettingsDescription: Manage your notification preferences. We'll send you notifications only when you set a reminder for them.
Settings.twoFactorAlreadyEnableDescription: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account.
Settings.twoFactorSettingsDescription: Enhance your account security with two-factor authentication. Once enabled, simply enter a unique code from your mobile device along with your password during sign-in for added protection.
Settings.twoFactorDisableDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to disable two-factor authentication?
Settings.twoFactorDisableDialogMessage: Two-factor authentication increases the security of your account. Are you sure you want to disable it? You can enable it again at any time.
Settings.twoFactorEnableDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to enable two-factor authentication?
Settings.twoFactorEnableDialogMessage: Upon enabling two-factor authentication, you will be required to enter a unique code from your mobile device in addition to your password when signing in.
Settings.twoFactorToastInfoMessage: You can now use the form below to enable two-factor authentication.
Settings.twoFactorFormStepOne: Get an authentication app by downloading it on your mobile device. Example:
Settings.twoFactorFormStepTwo: Scan the QR code or enter the secret key into your authentication app.
Settings.twoFactorFormStepThree: Enter the 6-digit code from the app to enable two-factor authentication.
Settings.convertCurrencyDialogTitle: Would you like to convert your transactions?
Settings.convertCurrencyDialogDescription: Your preferred currency has been updated. If you'd like, your transactions can be converted to your new currency. This process may take a few seconds.
Settings.convertCurrencySuccessMessage: Successfully converted transactions to the new currency rate
Settings.changeCurrencyDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to change your preferred currency?
Settings.changeCurrencyDialogMessage: You will be changing your preferred currency from: _fromLabel to: _toLabel.

AccountForm.noChangesDescription: You haven't made any changes to your account details.

AccountCard.deleteAccountDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
AccountCard.deleteAccountDialogMessage: This will also delete all the transactions associated with this account. This action cannot be undone.
AccountCard.deleteAccountErrorMessage: An error occurred while deleting the account. Please try again later.
AccountCard.editAccountAccountDialogMessage: Use the form below to edit your account details.
AccountCard.createTransactionAccountDialogMessage: Use the form below to create a new transaction.

BudgetCard.deleteBudgetDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this budget?
BudgetCard.editBudgetDialogMessage: Use the form below to edit your budget details.

BudgetForm.categoryErrorMessage: There was an error while getting budget categories. Please try again later.
BudgetForm.noChangesDescription: You haven't made any changes to your budget.

budgetCategoryField.label: Budget Category
budgetCategoryField.noCategoriesMessage: It appears you haven't created any budget categories yet.

CategoryForm.noChangesDescription: You haven't made any changes to the category

typeField.label: Category Type
typeField.description: Refers to the type of category you want to create.

GoalForm.noChangesDescription: You haven't made any changes to your goal.

GoalCard.deleteGoalDialogTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this goal?
GoalCard.editGoalDialogDescription: Edit your goal information by using the form below.

CreateBudgetCategoryPopover.title: Add Budget Category
